PRICE_LIST.HELP_TXT_1: Select an action on the left to edit price list properties
PRICE_LIST.TITLE: Price List Management
PRICE_LIST.UNABLE_TO_DELETE: Price list cannot be deleted - it may currently be assigned to patient / debtor groups

ERRORS.HAS_NEGATIVE_PRICE: You cannot assign a negative price to an item.  Please either assign a positive percentage, a negative percentage, or a positive value.

IMPORT.DESCRIPTION: You can upload a new price list from a CSV file.  First, download the existing inventory and remove the items that are not relevant.  Then, modify the prices a new price and upload the finished result.
IMPORT.DOWNLOAD: Click here to download the template file
